content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** makes it easy to clear business documents of previously added watermarks. Empower your {{EnvName}} application by installing our library and do it in a few simple steps:
content.step_1: First of all instantiate the main class called **Watermarker** with {{FileformatCap}} document. Our API supports passing a document to be processed as stream or a local path.
content.step_2: Use **SearchCriteria** to limit set of watermarks to be processed. It is possible to use an image as search parameter as well as text or formating features. Then more specific search parameters you provide, then more precise result you obtain.
content.step_3: Process list of the document watermarks that you have obtained as a search result. Clear the document.
content.step_4: After clearing the document save result as a local file or a byte stream.

more_features.title: Efficient Watermark Removal via Java API
more_features.description: Explore our Java API's robust capabilities to remove or clear watermarks from various document types, including PDFs, images, and Office files. Perfect for developers looking to maintain clean visuals and protect document integrity.

feature_1.title: Remove Watermarks with Precision
feature_1.content: Utilize our Java API to precisely target and delete watermarks without disrupting the original document layout. Ideal for sensitive or official documents where clarity and accuracy are paramount.

feature_2.title: Batch Watermark Deletion
feature_2.content: Enhance your document processing efficiency by removing watermarks from multiple files simultaneously. Our API supports batch operations, saving time and resources for large-scale tasks.

feature_3.title: Edit Out Watermark Elements
feature_3.content: Our advanced editing tools allow you to selectively edit out watermark components, providing flexibility in managing document presentations while ensuring content security.

code_1.title: PDF clear text watermark
code_1.content: This example shows how to find and remove all annotations containing text with a particular formatting from a PDF document.
code_1.comment_3: Clear text watermarks with particular font

head.title: Remove Watermarks from Excel with Java API
head.description: Easily clear, delete, or edit out watermarks from Excel files using the GroupDocs.Watermark Java API. Enhance document integrity and presentation.

about.title: {{ProdFullName}} library
about.content: With the {{ProdFullName}} Java library, developers can manage watermarks in Excel files seamlessly. This tool supports operations like removing, adjusting, and searching for both text and image watermarks. Ideal for applications requiring clean visual presentation of data without compromising the document's security or layout.
